philosophy.name: Lords of Hell
philosophy.description: Fighting to restore Hell`s glory and old ways.
philosophy.quote: It is better to reign in Hell than... well, it`s better than everything, frankly.

philosophy.name: Earth-Bound
philosophy.description: Looking to escape hell permanently for Earth.
philosophy.quote: Hell is over. We must get back to where the real souls are back to Earth!

philosophy.name: Demented
philosophy.description: Choosing to embrace the madness of Hell.
philosophy.quote: Those who seek after order in this madness are the truly insane.
philosophy.iconography: Ramshackle clothing and armor (the demented have no official common iconography).

philosophy.name: Brokers
philosophy.description: Trading and dealing the currency of souls.
philosophy.quote: Everything is for sale, if you have the souls to pay.

philosophy.name: Judges
philosophy.description: Using and abusing the remaining rules of power.
philosophy.quote: How could anyone else hope to win when they don`t evenknow the rules?

philosophy.name: The Empty
philosophy.description: Wanting to see Hell destroyed and unmade.
philosophy.quote: Hell has no more purpose, there is only one sensible outcome - oblivion.
